Job Posting: 178474 - Position: S26 Cloud Software Developer Intern / Stagiaire développeur de logiciels cloud 178474B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/27/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/19/2026 01:40 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country dormakaba Indianapolis IN Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Job ID: 10979 2026 - Summer S26 Cloud Software Developer Intern / Stagiaire développeur de logiciels cloud 178474B Co-op Position Montreal, QC Canada 4 months In-Person CAD 0.0 per hour for 40 Major List Base Salary 24.00$ 28.00$ Position Overview dormakaba is seeking a Cloud Software Developer Intern to join our Summer 2025 Rising Talent Program in Montreal, Quebec! This role will report directly to the Software Development Manager. Rising Talent Internship Program Looking to apply your skills to real-world business challenges alongside experienced professionals? dormakaba's Rising Talent Internship Program offers hands-on projects that make a real impact-from manufacturing and product design to customer engagement and innovation. Learn more about the program by watching this short video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qD_8FLLdkOU HIRING SALARY RANGE: Base Salary 24.00$ 28.00$ (Salary to be determined by the education, experience, knowledge, skills, and abilities of the applicant, internal equity, and alignment with market data.) Please visit our career site for more information on benefits. Applicants must be authorized to work for any employer in Canada. We are unable to sponsor or take over sponsorship of an employment visa at this time.? What you will do Full-stack development of new functionality/maintenance development of existing code, code reviews and resolve production • issues. • Develop strong empathy skills with customer situations • Be responsible for features from development to production • Collaborate amongst team to improve products • Gather data and analyze the business challenges alongside subject matter experts • Schedule routine check-in meetings with your supervisor to monitor the advancement of assigned projects • Attend weekly lunch and learn sessions where you will get to learn more about a business topic of the week! Who we are We are at the heart of every place that matters. From automatic doors to cloud-based access management - as a leading global provider in the access solutions market for schools, banks, airports, hospitals, hotels, and many more, we enable seamless movement within secure, safe, and sustainable places. With over 160 years of experience and a focus on excellence and innovation, we offer exciting opportunities to grow in an environment where you can make a real impact. At dormakaba, you are encouraged to take initiative, develop your skills, and build your career alongside 16,000 experts worldwide who are setting industry standards every day. Work in a place where you matter - apply now! Please refer to the application link for the job description in French. Contact Linnea Mobley is looking forward to your application. Job Requirements What we require Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's degree program in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information • Technology, or related field • Practical Knowledge in C# using .NET 6+, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles • Solid understanding of asynchronous programming, microservices architecture, and multithreading concepts • Solid understanding of RESTful APIs and backend development concepts • Practical knowledge of ORM (Entity Framework, nhibernate) • Practical Knowledge in ASP.Net MVC, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, XML, TypeScript • Practical knowledge of SQL and Non-SQL (DynamoDB, MongoDB) • Familiarity with using AI to help in code quality and reliability, AI Agents, and multimodal learning. • Familiarity with AWS Ability to work full-time, 40 hours per week for 10-12 weeks • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: Cloud Software Developer Intern / Stagiaire développeur de logiciels cloud Job Details | dormakaba Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
